name: Chinese
description: The Chinese can shift their focus across the ages, deploying many unique units and building rapidly. Enemies must continually adapt if they want to keep up.
descriptionCN: 中国人可以在多个时代间转移重心，部署各种独特的单位并迅速进行建设。敌人如果想要跟上其发展的速度，就必须要不断适应。

overview.title: Civilization Bonuses
list: Begin in the Tang Dynasty - increasing Scouts line of sight by +30% and provides access to the Village.
Units trained, technologies researched, and resources dropped off generate tax (Gold) that can be collected by Imperial Officials.
Enter a new Dynasty by building both Landmarks from an Age to unlock special bonuses, unique units, and buildings.
Villagers construct defenses +50% faster and all other buildings +100% faster.
Chemistry technology granted for free in the Dark Age (I) — Town Centers, Keeps, and Outposts use Handcannon Slits instead of Defensive Arrowslits.

overview.title: Great Dynasties
overview.description:
Start your journey in the Tang Dynasty — increases Scout line of sight +30% and provides access to the Village.
Construct both Landmarks in an Age to start Dynasties with special bonuses, unique buildings, and units.
• Song Dynasty: Produce Villagers +33% faster — unlocks Granary and Zhuge Nu.
• Yuan Dynasty: Villagers, Officials and military unit move speed +15% — unlocks Pagoda and Fire Lancer.
• Ming Dynasty: Military units +15% health — unlocks Grenadier.

overview.title: Rapid Fabrications
overview.description: Villagers construct defenses +50% faster and all other buildings +100% faster. Docks work +10% faster.

overview.title: Masters of Gunpowder
overview.description: Begin the game with Chemistry technology granted for free - defensive buildings use Handcannon Slits over Defensive Arrowslits.

overview.title: Taxes
overview.description: Units trained, technologies researched, and resources dropped off generate Tax (Gold) that can be collected by Imperial Officials.

overview.title: Influence
overview.description: Construct military and economic buildings within the Imperial Academy Landmark's influence to generate +100% tax Gold.

overview.title: Unique Units
overview.description:
Imperial Official: Use the Supervise ability to boost production speed of research and military buildings by +150% — supervising economic buildings increases the amount of resources dropped off by Villagers by +20%.
Zhuge Nu: Light ranged infantry with a rapid burst attack effective vs. light units.
Palace Guard: Man-at-Arms replacement. Heavy melee infantry that exchanges armor for move speed.
Nest of Bees: Mangonel replacement. Siege engine that fires a barrage of rockets, doing area of effect damage.
Fire Lancer: Light cavalry effective vs. siege engines and buildings. Comes with extensive sight range and an explosive charge attack.
Grenadier: Light ranged gunpowder infantry that throws grenades dealing area of effect damage.

overviewCN.title: 文明加成
overviewCN.description:
从唐朝开始 - 侦察兵的视野 +30%，并可以使用村庄。
• 朝廷命官可收集训练单位、研究科技和存放资源所产生的税 (黄金)。
• 建造一个时代的两座地标，即可进入新时代，并解锁特殊加成、独特单位和建筑。
• 村民建造防御工事的速度 +50%，建造所有其他建筑的速度 +100%。
• 在黑暗时代 (第一时代) 可免费获得化学技术——城镇中心、城堡和哨站使用手铳射击槽代替防御射箭槽。
• 码头工作速度 +10%。

overviewCN.title: 盛世王朝
overviewCN.description:
以唐朝开始游戏，侦察兵的视野范围 +30%，并可以获得村庄。
通过在一个时代中建造两个地标来进入新朝代，并获得特殊加成、独特建筑和单位。
• 宋朝：生产村民的速度提高 +33%，并解锁谷仓和诸葛弩手
• 元朝：村民、命官和军事单位移动速度 +15%，并解锁宝塔和火长矛骑兵。
• 明朝：军事单位生命值 +15%，并解锁掷弹兵。

overviewCN.title: 快速建造
overviewCN.description: 村民建造防御设施的速度 +50%，建造其他建筑的速度 +100%。船坞工作速度 +10%。

overviewCN.title: 火药大师
overviewCN.description: 在游戏开始时免费解锁化学科技，防御建筑改为使用手铳射击槽，而不是射箭槽。

overviewCN.title: 赋税
overviewCN.description: 训练单位、研究科技以及存放资源可以产生税金，并由朝廷命官收集。

overviewCN.title: 影响力
overviewCN.description: 在翰林院地标的影响范围内建造军事和经济建筑可以使产生的税金 +100%。

overviewCN.title: 独特单位
overviewCN.description:
朝廷命官：可以使用监督能力使研究和军事建筑的工作速度 +150%，还可以监督经济建筑以使村民存放的资源量 +20%。
诸葛弩手：轻型远程步兵单位，可以快速地发动爆发攻击，擅长对付轻型单位。
皇宫卫兵：武士的替代单位。通过牺牲护甲来提高移动速度的重型近战步兵。
一窝蜂：轻型投石车的替代单位。这种攻城器械可以发射大片火箭，造成范围伤害。
火长矛骑兵：擅长对付攻城器械和建筑的轻型骑兵。自带极大的视野范围，并可以进行攻击力巨大的冲锋攻击。
掷弹兵：轻型远程火药步兵，可以投掷震天雷，造成范围伤害。
